title: LoLCLIENT
body: i have a big problem. now is downloading the new patch. and everytime downloads with 200-300 kb /s . but now download with 30kb/s . rlly ? that is a joke ? my network is up to download with 10.000 kb /s . what is the problem ? please help me.

replies.body: It can take a few moments for the patcher to update depending on the computer.  As long as there are no errors happening, the best thing you can do is wait it out.  Closing it can cause more delays and rescan files to check for any corruption.  Hang tight!
